content.title: Alpsankhyak Merit-Cum-Means Chatravriti Yojana
content.details: The Alpsankhyak Merit-Cum-Means Chatravriti Yojana under the Higher Education Department of Madhya Pradesh aims to provide financial assistance to meritorious students from minority communities who are unable to pursue higher education due to financial constraints. The objective is to ensure that talented students from minority backgrounds have access to quality education and are not deterred by financial barriers. By offering scholarships based on both merit and means, the scheme intends to empower minority students to fulfill their academic potential and contribute positively to society. Additionally, it seeks to promote inclusivity and diversity in higher education by supporting students from marginalized communities.
benefits: Hostel students receive a maintenance allowance of ₹1,000/- per month for 10 months.
Non-hostel students are provided with a maintenance allowance of ₹500/- per month for 10 months.
Reimbursement of actual course fees or ₹20,000/- whichever is less.
eligibility: The applicant should be a native of the minority category of Madhya Pradesh.
The total annual income of the parents and guardians of the applicant should not exceed ₹2,50,000/-.
The applicants must have a score of at least 50 percent marks in the last qualifying examination.

faqs.question: What is the objective of the Alpsankhyak Merit-Cum-Means Chatravriti Yojana?
faqs.answer: The objective of the Alpsankhyak Merit-Cum-Means Chatravriti Yojana is to provide financial assistance to meritorious students from minority communities who are unable to pursue higher education due to financial constraints.

faqs.question: May other state student apply?
faqs.answer: Only Students who are permanent residents of Madhya Pradesh.

faqs.question: What is the income criteria to eligible?
faqs.answer: The total annual income of the parents and guardians of the applicant should not exceed ₹ 2,50,000/-.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to apply for this scholarship?
faqs.answer: The Merit-cum-Means Scholarship for Minorities is open to meritorious students belonging to minority communities who want to pursue professional and technical courses.

faqs.question: Can I apply online for this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, Applicants have to visit the official website.

faqs.question: How do a applicant know if a field in the application form is mandatory?
faqs.answer: Mandatory fields are usually (but not always) marked with an asterisk sign (*).

faqs.question: Can I apply offline for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, you can apply online only.

faqs.question: Is this scheme Urban and Rural?
faqs.answer: Yes, Urban and Rural both can apply for this scheme.

faqs.question: Under which department does this scheme come?
faqs.answer: Higher Education Department of Madhya Pradesh.
